result.execSummary:
All charges against Michael Joel Stucki in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael Joel Stucki is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Joel Stucki

defendant.name: Stucki, Michael Joel

records.addlTxt:
State by Donskey  /  Def w/ Atty Rust
Rust:  newest case is case in which Pub Def office is looking for counsel.  Once we have counsel on that matter, there will be global plea that I believe def will be interested in
Donskey:  State has complied w/ Victim/Witness notification.  No objection to continuance
CRT:  Reschedule Plea 30 days out - contact my JA for date
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

11:29 AM Defendant Michael Joel Stucki not in court.  Attorney Courtney Kay Strittmater in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Warrant - $1000

State by Strittmater /  Def in custody w/ Atty Rust
Stucki:  I had address change - JSS put memo in on Fri & I haven't heard anything back.  JSS verified my dad's address
Rust:  I haven't rec'd any communication from JSS - the Holiday has thrown some things off
Strittmater:  I have no objection to change of address - I would feel better if we had some verification from JSS w/ address & something stating that def can stay there...
Stucki:  JSS has verified it - I have just been waiting
CRT:  JSS TO SEND CRT A MEMO STATING THAT IT HAS BEEN VERIFIED THAT DEF CAN GO TO HIS FATHER'S HOUSE IN REDWING.  MR STUCKI TO DO APPLICATION FOR PUB DEF FOR CASES MR RUST IS UNABLE TO REPRESENT HIM ON

from JSS   re: def was to have address verified before release.  After speaking w/ tenant @ 313 Main St, Onalaska, he is not allowed to reside there so JSS will not be releasing him.  Please advise
Per TWB:  Def is to be held until an appropriate residence can be verified or a viable release plan is submitted by JSS for Judicial Review

Def in custody w/ Atty Simpson- specially/.    All appearances via ZOOM. 
$1500 signature bond w/ no contact w/ Festival Foods- Onalaska.    JSS to verify address of 313 Main St Onalaska before releasing def.    Refer to JSS.   Comply with JSS conditions- bail monitoring. 
Simpson- def needs to apply to our office 
State- Requests cash bond.  
PH: 7/15/22 @11am
Preliminary hearing on July 15, 2022 at 11:00 am.
